column4: hey guy i need some help setting up an imap server on 10.04... i have spent almost 10 hrs working no this and have gotten no where HELP!
what server did you install and how?
i have 10.04 lts server, with postfix, dovecot, and squirrelmail... ive installed and uninstalled allot of crap traying to fix the problem. so im down with whever will work with 10.04
you might get better help in #ubuntu-server then
